about_the_game:
Includes 18 tracks from Orcs Must Die! and Orcs Must Die! 2.

TRACKLIST:
  • Title Track
  • Castlemania
  • Gore Mage
  • Apocalypstick
  • Giant Killerz
  • Slay Muffin
  • Samilton
  • Mine Games
  • Lil Monster
  • Bar Fight
  • Ludvig Von Bad Bottom
  • Two Tone Towers
  • Skull Crush
  • Womantastic
  • Lovers Quarrel
  • Ogres in Like
  • You Win (Original)
  • Got Any Creidts
    All files are MP3 format

    Upon release, songs will be placed in your Orcs Must Die! 2 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\orcs must die 2\Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Includes 18 tracks from Orcs Must Die! and Orcs Must Die! 2.

TRACKLIST:
  • Title Track
  • Castlemania
  • Gore Mage

  • Lovers Quarrel

    All files are MP3 format

    Upon release, songs will be placed in your Orcs Must Die! 2 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\orcs must die 2\Soundtrack
